page.title: 13SCHOOL
page.content: There are{5}classes in the school.{Mr {Ridgway}is the Head Master.The work we do is Scottish Primary Maths,English Primary Language Program and language Pattern (Skills Book),Spelling and Handwriting.We also have Sports Day where there are{3}teams;{YELLOW, RED {BLUE}we all join in doing various sports.We have a sponsored walk where you are sponsored so much for so many miles.In{class 4}in{1985}they started gardening and have grown many different vegetables. We have some seperate buildings;one is the garage with all the sports equipment in and the staffroom which is joined on to the outside toilets.The school was built around {1875}to {1876}and opened in{1877.}The school was built for{285 children but now it has 111 children.The children are aged from 4 to 11 years old.
